case.title: Kisses and cuddles - 28 (london)
case.text:
hi
thanks for reading my ad, so here goes.
I'm a fun loving down to earth guy with a GREAT sense of humour. i am a recent graduate, intelligent a little quirky and silly at times. i love films, sports, the usual guy stuff. but most of all i love cuddling up in front of the TV and holding hands (sounds gay i know), i'm missing affection in my lief and want it in abundance.
I'm looking for a lady around my age to hang out with and see if we can spark the beginnings of a great relationship, you have to have a great sense of humour, not easly offended, enjoy having a laugh. Not into dramas and have a great personality. P.s if you have an accent you will get bonus points.
I'm 6ft1 attractive black hair green eyes, medium build.
if all this sound great to you then get in touch.
